logicalColumns.description: This metric is calculated as Maximum of Invoice Amounts divided by Invoiced Quantity where Quantity Invoiced is not zero. This metric is calculated for Invoice distributions conforming as Addressable Spend

physicalExpression.expressionTemplate: CASE  WHEN  IFNULL(%1, 0) = 0 OR %2 = 'NO' THEN  NULL  ELSE %3 END

logicalColumns.name: Spend
logicalColumns.description: This metric is calculated as Sum of Invoice Amounts where invoice is approved and invoice distribution is validated, This metric excludes Invoice Distributions for withholding tax invoices and lines, prepayment invoices and prepayment application lines

logicalColumns.name: Spend in Ledger Currency
logicalColumns.description: This metric is calculated as Sum of Invoice Amounts where invoice is approved and invoice distribution is validated, This metric excludes Invoice Distributions for withholding tax invoices and lines, prepayment invoices and prepayment application lines

logicalColumns.name: Spend in Analytics Currency

expressionObjects: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - PRC - Spend.Invoice Amount in Analytics Currency

logicalColumns.name: Addressable Spend
logicalColumns.description: This metric is calculated as Sum of Spend where invoice Distribution has Purchase Order reference and Invoice Line types are Item or Misc and excludes any tax related lines in invoices

expressionObjects: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - PRC - Spend.Invoice Amount in Analytics Currency

logicalColumns.name: Non Agreement Spend

logicalColumns.name: Non Agreement Spend in Ledger Currency
logicalColumns.description: This metric is calculated as Sum of 'Spend' where invoice Distributions has Purchase Order reference and that Purchase Order Line doesn't have a Blanket Purchase Agreement or Contract Purchase agreement reference

logicalColumn:Core.Fact - PRC - Spend.Agreement Spend in Analytics Currency

logicalColumns.name: Agreement Leakage Spend
logicalColumns.description: This metric is calculated as Sum of 'Spend' where invoice Distributions has Purchase Order reference and the purchase order lines doesn't has an agreement associated though a open Blanket agreement is available for the item in Purchase order. This metric works only for 'Inventory Item' based purchase orders.

expressionObjects: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - PRC - Spend.Agreement Leakage Lines Indicator

logicalColumns.name: Agreement Leakage Spend in Ledger Currency
logicalColumns.description: This metric is calculated as Sum of 'Spend' where invoice Distributions has Purchase Order reference and the purchase order lines doesn't has an agreement associated though a open Blanket agreement is available for the item in Purchase order. This metric works only for 'Inventory Item' based purchase orders.

expressionObjects: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - PRC - Spend.Invoice Amount in Ledger Currency

This metric works only for 'Inventory Item' based purchase orders.

expressionObjects: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - PRC - Spend.Invoice Amount in Analytics Currency

logicalColumns.description: This metric is calculated as Sum of 'Spend' divided by Count of Spend Invoices

logicalColumns.name: Quantity Invoiced
logicalColumns.description: This metric is calculated as Sum of Quantity Invoiced from Invoice distributions.

logicalColumns.name: Invoices Count
logicalColumns.description: This metric is calculated as Count of Distinct invoice Headers

logicalColumns.name: Invoice Lines Count
logicalColumns.description: This metric is calculated as Count of Distinct invoice Lines

physicalExpression.expressionTemplate: CAST (%1 AS VARCHAR ( 30 )) ||  CAST (%2 AS VARCHAR ( 30 ))

logicalColumns.name: Manual Invoices Count
logicalColumns.description: This metric is calculated as Count of Distinct Invoice Headers where Invoice Header source equal to Manual Invoice Entry

physicalExpression.expressionTemplate: CASE  WHEN %1 = 'Manual Invoice Entry' THEN %2 END

logicalColumns.name: Electronic Invoices Count
logicalColumns.description: This metric is calculated as Count of Distinct Invoice Headers where Invoice Header source not equal to Manual Invoice Entry

physicalExpression.expressionTemplate: CASE  WHEN %1 = 'YES' THEN %2 END

logicalColumns.name: Purchase Order Lines Count
logicalColumns.description: This metric is calculated as Count of Distinct Purchase Order Lines referred in Invoice Distributions

physicalExpression.expressionTemplate: CASE  WHEN %1 > 0 THEN %1 END

logicalColumns.name: Purchase Orders Count
logicalColumns.description: This metric is calculated as Count of Distinct Purchase Order Headers referred in Invoice Distributions

physicalExpression.expressionTemplate: CASE  WHEN %1 > 0 THEN %1 END

logicalColumns.name: Suppliers Count
logicalColumns.description: This metric is calculated as Count of Distinct Suppliers on Invoice Headers

physicalExpression.expressionTemplate: CASE  WHEN %1 > 0 THEN %1 END

logicalColumns.name: Buyer Count
logicalColumns.description: This metric is calculated as Count of Distinct buyer on Invoice Headers

physicalExpression.expressionTemplate: CASE  WHEN %1 > 0 THEN %1 END

logicalColumns.name: Supplier Site Count
logicalColumns.description: This metric is calculated as Count of Distinct Supplier Site on Invoice Headers

physicalExpression.expressionTemplate: CASE  WHEN %1 > 0 THEN %1 END

logicalColumns.name: Payables Invoicing Business Unit Count
logicalColumns.description: This metric is calculated as Count of Distinct Payables Invoicing Business Unit on Invoice Headers

physicalExpression.expressionTemplate: CASE  WHEN %1 > 0 THEN %1 END

logicalColumns.name: Purchasing Category Count
logicalColumns.description: This metric is calculated as Count of Distinct purchasing category on Invoice Headers

physicalExpression.expressionTemplate: CASE  WHEN %1 > 0 THEN %1 END

logicalColumns.name: Payment Terms Count
logicalColumns.description: This metric is calculated as Count of Distinct payment terms on Invoice Headers

physicalExpression.expressionTemplate: CASE  WHEN %1 > 0 THEN %1 END

logicalColumns.name: PO Matched Invoices Count
logicalColumns.description: This metric is calculated as Count of Distinct invoices headers which are fully or partially matched to PO.

physicalExpression.expressionTemplate: CASE  WHEN %1 = 'YES' THEN %2 END

logicalColumns.name: Invoices Before PO Creation Count
logicalColumns.description: This metric is calculated as Count of invoice Headers where Invoice date is greater than PO Creation date

physicalExpression.expressionTemplate: CASE  WHEN %1 = 'YES' AND %2 > %3 THEN %4 END

logicalColumns.name: Paid Invoices Count
logicalColumns.description: This metric is calculated as Count of Distinct Invoice Headers where Invoice Header is already paid

physicalExpression.expressionTemplate: CASE  WHEN %1 = 'Y' THEN %2 END

logicalColumns.name: Open Invoices Count
logicalColumns.description: This metric is calculated as Count of Distinct Invoice Headers where Invoice Header Status is not paid yet

logicalColumns.name: Invoices with IPV Count
logicalColumns.description: This metric is calculated as Count of Distinct Invoice Headers where Invoice Header has more than one distribution line status in IPV or TIPV

physicalExpression.expressionTemplate: CASE  WHEN %1 = 'YES' AND %2 IN ('IPV', 'TIPV') THEN %3 END

logicalColumns.name: Perfect Invoices Count
logicalColumns.description: This metric is calculated as Count of Distinct Invoice Headers where Invoice Header is partially or fully matched to PO and no price variance

expressionObjects: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - PRC - Spend.PO Matched Invoices Count
logicalColumn:Core.Fact - PRC - Spend.Invoices with IPV Count

physicalExpression.expressionTemplate: CASE  WHEN %1 = 'YES' AND %2 = 'YES' THEN  IFNULL(%3, 0) END
CASE  WHEN %1 = 'YES' THEN  IFNULL(%2, 0) END
CASE  WHEN %1 > 0 AND %2 = 'YES' THEN %3 END

logicalColumns.name: PO Matched Spend %
logicalColumns.description: This metric is calculated as the percentage of PO Spend Amount over Spend Amount

logicalExpression.expressionTemplate: CASE  WHEN  IFNULL(%1, 0) <> 0 THEN  IFNULL(%2, 0) / %1 * 100 END

logicalColumns.name: Agreement Spend %
logicalColumns.description: This metric is calculated as the percentage of agreement spend over spend amount

logicalExpression.expressionTemplate: CASE  WHEN  IFNULL(%1, 0) <> 0 THEN  IFNULL(%2, 0) / %1 * 100 END

logicalColumns.name: Non Agreement Spend %
logicalColumns.description: This metric is calculated as the percentage of non agreement amount over spend amount

logicalExpression.expressionTemplate: CASE  WHEN  IFNULL(%1, 0) <> 0 THEN  IFNULL(%2, 0) / %1 * 100 END

logicalColumns.name: Agreement Leakage Spend %
logicalColumns.description: This metric is calculated as the percentage of agreement leakage amount over spend amount

logicalExpression.expressionTemplate: CASE  WHEN  IFNULL(%1, 0) <> 0 THEN  IFNULL(%2, 0) / %1 * 100 END

logicalColumns.name: Negotiated Spend %
logicalColumns.description: This metric is calculated as the percentage of negotiated spend amount over spend amount

logicalExpression.expressionTemplate: CASE  WHEN  IFNULL(%1, 0) <> 0 THEN  IFNULL(%2, 0) / %1 * 100 END

logicalColumns.name: Non PO Matched Spend %
logicalColumns.description: This metric is calculated as the percentage of non PO matched spend amount over spend amount

logicalExpression.expressionTemplate: CASE  WHEN  IFNULL(%1, 0) <> 0 THEN  IFNULL(%2, 0) / %1 * 100 END
expressionObjects: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - PRC - Spend.Non PO Matched Spend

logicalColumns.name: Supplier Spend %
logicalColumns.description: This metric is calculated as the percentage of spend amount over spend amount across all suppliers. This percentage metrics should be used to analyze individual supplier spend against the spend across all suppliers

logicalExpression.expressionTemplate: CASE  WHEN  IFNULL(%1, 0) <> 0 THEN  IFNULL(%2, 0) / %1 * 100 END

logicalColumns.name: Category Spend %
logicalColumns.description: This metric is calculated as the percentage of spend amount over spend amount across all categories.This percentage metrics should be used to analyze individual category spend against the spend across all categories.

logicalExpression.expressionTemplate: CASE  WHEN  IFNULL(%1, 0) <> 0 THEN  IFNULL(%2, 0) / %1 * 100 END
expressionObjects: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - PRC - Spend.PO Matched Spend All Category

logicalColumns.name: Item Based Purchases %
logicalColumns.description: This metric is calculated as the percentage of distinct count of item based purchase order lines over distinct count of purchase order line

logicalExpression.expressionTemplate: CASE  WHEN  IFNULL(%1, 0) <> 0 THEN  IFNULL(%2, 0) / %1 * 100 END
expressionObjects: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - PRC - Spend.Purchase Order Lines Count
logicalColumn:Core.Fact - PRC - Spend.Item Based Purchases Count

physicalExpression.expressionTemplate: CASE  WHEN  IFNULL(%1, 0) = 0 OR %2 = 'NO' THEN  NULL  ELSE %3 END

logicalColumns.name: Addressable Invoice Unit Price in Ledger Currency

physicalExpression.expressionTemplate: CASE  WHEN  IFNULL(%1, 0) = 0 OR %2 IS NULL  OR  IFNULL(%3, 0) = 0 OR  IFNULL(%4, 0) = 0 OR %5 = 'NO' THEN  NULL  ELSE %2 * %4 / %3 END

logicalColumns.name: Addressable Invoice Unit Price in Analytics Currency

physicalExpression.expressionTemplate: CASE  WHEN  IFNULL(%1, 0) = 0 OR %2 IS NULL  OR %3 IS NULL  OR %4 = 'NO' THEN  NULL  ELSE %2 * %3 END
CASE  WHEN %1 > 0 THEN %1 END
CASE  WHEN %1 > 0 THEN %1 END
CAST (%1 AS VARCHAR ( 30 )) || '~' ||  CAST (%2 AS VARCHAR ( 30 ))

logicalColumns.name: Quantity Invoiced Internal
logicalColumns.description: This metric is calculated as Sum of Quantity Invoiced from Invoice distributions.

physicalExpression.expressionTemplate: CASE  WHEN %1 = 'YES' AND %2 IN ('IPV', 'TIPV') THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END

logicalColumns.name: Invoice Price Variance
logicalColumns.description: This metric is calculated as sum of amounts from Invoice distribution for Distribution Line status Invoice Price Variance.

expressionObjects: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - PRC - Spend.Invoice Price Variance Indicator

logicalColumns.name: Invoice Price Variance in Analytics Currency
logicalColumns.description: This metric is calculated as sum of amounts from Invoice distribution for Distribution Line status Invoice Price Variance.

expressionObjects: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - PRC - Spend.Invoice Amount in Analytics Currency
logicalColumn:Core.Fact - PRC - Spend.Invoice Price Variance Indicator

logicalColumns.name: Invoice Price Variance in Ledger Currency
logicalColumns.description: This metric is calculated as sum of amounts from Invoice distribution for Distribution Line status Invoice Price Variance.

expressionObjects: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - PRC - Spend.Invoice Amount in Ledger Currency
logicalColumn:Core.Fact - PRC - Spend.Invoice Price Variance Indicator

logicalColumns.name: Buyers Count
logicalColumns.description: This metric is calculated as Count of Distinct buyer on Invoice Headers

physicalExpression.expressionTemplate: CASE  WHEN %1 > 0 THEN %1 END

logicalColumns.name: Primary Quantity Invoiced Internal
logicalColumns.description: This metric is calculated as Sum of Quantity Invoiced from Invoice distributions.

expressionObjects: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - PRC - Spend.Primary Quantity Invoiced Internal

physicalExpression.expressionTemplate: CASE  WHEN %1 = 'YES' THEN  IFNULL(%2, 0) END
CASE  WHEN  IFNULL(%1, 0) = 0 OR %2 = 'NO' OR  IFNULL(%3, 0) = 0 THEN  NULL  ELSE %4 / %3 END

logicalColumns.name: Addressable Invoice Unit Price in Ledger Currency (Primary UOM)

physicalExpression.expressionTemplate: CASE  WHEN  IFNULL(%1, 0) = 0 OR %2 IS NULL  OR  IFNULL(%3, 0) = 0 OR  IFNULL(%4, 0) = 0 OR %5 = 'NO' OR  IFNULL(%6, 0) = 0 THEN  NULL  ELSE %2 / %6 * %4 / %3 END

logicalColumns.name: Addressable Invoice Unit Price in Analytics Currency (Primary UOM)

physicalExpression.expressionTemplate: CASE  WHEN  IFNULL(%1, 0) = 0 OR %2 IS NULL  OR %3 IS NULL  OR %4 = 'NO' OR  IFNULL(%5, 0) = 0 THEN  NULL  ELSE %2 / %5 * %3 END

logicalColumns.name: Max Invoice Unit Price (Primary UOM)
logicalColumns.description: This metric is calculated as Maximum of Invoice Amounts divided by Invoiced Quantity (Primary UOM) where Quantity Invoiced is not zero. This metric is calculated for Invoice distributions conforming as Addressable Spend

physicalExpression.expressionTemplate: CASE  WHEN  IFNULL(%1, 0) = 0 OR %2 = 'NO' OR  IFNULL(%3, 0) = 0 THEN  NULL  ELSE %4 / %3 END

logicalColumns.name: Min Invoice Unit Price (Primary UOM)
logicalColumns.description: This metric is calculated as Minimum of Invoice Amounts divided by Primary Invoiced Quantity where Quantity Invoiced is not zero. This metric is calculated for Invoice distributions conforming as Addressable Spend

logicalColumns.name: Avg Invoice Unit Price (Primary UOM)
logicalColumns.description: This metric is calculated as Sum of Invoice Amounts divided by Sum of Primary Invoiced Quantity where Quantity Invoiced is not zero. This metric is calculated for Invoice distributions conforming as Addressable Spend

physicalExpression.expressionTemplate: CASE  WHEN  IFNULL(%1, 0) = 0 OR %2 IS NULL  OR %3 IS NULL  OR %4 = 'NO' OR  IFNULL(%5, 0) = 0 THEN  NULL  ELSE %2 / %5 * %3 END

logicalColumns.name: Avg Invoice Unit Price in Analytics Currency (Primary UOM)
logicalColumns.description: This metric is calculated as Sum of Invoice Amounts divided by Sum of Primary Invoiced Quantity where Quantity Invoiced is not zero. This metric is calculated for Invoice distributions conforming as Addressable Spend

expressionObjects: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - PRC - Spend.Addressable Invoice Distribution Quantity (Primary UOM)
logicalColumn:Core.Fact - PRC - Spend.Addressable Invoice Distribution Amount in Analytics Currency

logicalColumns.name: Other Non-Agreement Spend%
logicalColumns.description: This metric is calculated as the percentage of Other non agreement spend amount over spend amount.

logicalExpression.expressionTemplate: CASE  WHEN  IFNULL(%1, 0) <> 0 THEN  IFNULL(%2, 0) / %1 * 100 END
expressionObjects: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - PRC - Spend.Other Non Agreement Spend

logicalTableSources.name: Fact_DW_INVOICE_SPEND_CF
